purpleculture_pinyin:
gěng
to choke on a piece of food; (literary) a fish bone lodged in one's throat
подавиться куском еды; (литературный) рыбья кость застряла в горле

geng3
(Simplified: 鲠)
鯁直 [ gěng zhí ]: variant of 耿直
(Simplified: 鲠)
Freq: 8519
Hanzi: 鲠
鲠，形声字，基本释义是鱼骨。也假借为“骾”，表示鱼刺卡在喉咙里。
鲠, pictophonetic character, the basic interpretation is fish bone. It is also pretended to be "鲠", which means that the fishbone is stuck in the throat.

鯁字的基本解释

鯁
gěng
见“鲠”。

鯁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gěng］
［《廣韻》古杏切，上梗，見。］
亦作“鞕2”。“鲠1”的繁体字。
(1)鱼骨；鱼刺。
(2)骨、刺等卡在喉中。
(3)阻塞；堵塞。
(4)谓阻挠，从中作梗。
(5)害，祸患。
(6)直，正直。
(7)指正直的人。
(8)通“哽”。参见“鯁涕”。
(9)通“更”。轮流更替。
(10)见“鯁鯁”。
[②]［biān］
同“鯾1”。“鲠2”的繁体字。
鳊鱼。

鯁字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯁； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1471第06
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古杏切，梗去聲。【說文】本作?，魚骨。【廣韻】刺在喉。【儀禮·公食大夫禮註】乾魚近腴，多骨鯁。【前漢·賈山傳】祝鯁在後。又【廣韻】骨鯁蹇諤之臣。【後漢·來歙傳】太中大夫段襄骨鯁，可任。【註】骨鯁，喩正直也。又【淮南子·地形訓】蛟龍生鯤鯁。又與梗同。【後漢·殷熲傳】至今爲鯁。【註】與梗同。又【集韻】居孟切，音賡。義同。

鯁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

鲠
Basic explanation of words
鲠
gěng
See "鲠".
鲠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gěng］
["Guangyun" ancient apricot cut, top stem, see you. ]
Also known as "鞕2". "鲠1" in traditional characters.
(1) Fishbone; Fishbone.
(2) The bones, thorns, etc. are stuck in the throat.
(3) Blockage; blockage.
(4) Obstruction is called obstruction.
(5) Harm, disaster.
(6) Straight, upright.
(7) Refers to an upright person.
(8) Through "choking". See also "stubby".
(9) Through "more". Take turns.
(10) See "鲠鲠".
[②]［biān］
Same as "鯾1". "鲠2" in traditional characters.
Bream.
鲠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲠; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1471 Page 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Gu Xing cut, stalked. [Said the text] This work?, fish bones. [Guang Yun] Stabbed in the throat. [Ritual and Public Food Doctor's Note] The dried fish is close to fleshy and bony. [Previous Han·Jia Shan Biography] Zhu Kun is behind. Also 【Guangyun】The minister of the bone scorpion. [Laishe Biography of the Later Han Dynasty] Taizhong doctor Duan Xianggukun, he can do whatever he wants. [Note] The bones are upright. Also [Huainanzi·Training of Terrain] Jiaolongsheng Kunkun. And the same as the stem. [Later Han·Yin Xi Biography] So far it is Kun. [Note] The same as the stem. Also 【Jiyun】Ju Mengqie, sound Geng. The same meaning.
